meanings.sent1: I have a bookoo of toys in my room.
meanings.sent2: She bought a bookoo of candy at the store.
meanings.sent3: The birthday party had a bookoo of balloons floating around.
meanings.sent4: The library had a bookoo of books on the shelves.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was filled with a bookoo of gold coins.

meanings.definition: To a great extent or degree
meanings.sent1: He bookooed his excitement when he saw the surprise.
meanings.sent2: They bookooed their efforts to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The puppy bookooed its energy running around the park.
meanings.sent4: The storm bookooed its fury with strong winds and heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: Her laughter bookooed through the entire house, making everyone smile.
